name: [Magnetic Storm] Alpha
background: This special W-Engine can analyze the target's weak spots through real-time calculations. Although its heavy exoskeleton can be a burden to the operator, some users have found it to be an efficient way to exercise and lose weight, and have thus become loyal customers.
skill: Accumulating Anomaly Buildup increases the equipper's Anomaly Mastery by 25/28/32/36/40 for 10s. This effect can trigger once every 20s.
